>Message: 15

From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
Subject: Re: (no subject)

Salr you can buy ALL fletching equipment in Ferrot, not far from the ogre
city. On the banks of the river is a small trading outpost of ogres. What
possessed verant to know put everything needed in Neriak - the centre of
the
world (ogres with bows? bah!) is beyond me.

Jaade,
Indigo Sista Soldier.<

Arrow parts can not be purchased there that I have seen, only bow
components, a very expensive way to raise fletching skill.

Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
